text: Jan Verroken (30 January 1917 â€“ 24 July 2020) was a Belgian politician. He was born in Melden, Belgium. He was a member of the Christelijke Volkspartij. He was a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 1950 to 1981. Verroken was a member of the European Parliament from 1979 to 1984. He was Mayor of Oudenaarde from 1983 to 1988. Verroken died on 24 July 2020 in Mechelen, Belgium at the age of 103. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian mayors Category:Belgian centenarians Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Flemish people Category:MEPs for Belgium Category:People from East Flanders
title: Jan Verroken
